snippet: As the president readies his State of the Union address, many associates say he is exhibiting an assertiveness in contrast to the caution he showed most of his first term.
abstract: Washington Memo; as Pres Obama readies his State of the Union address, many associates say he is exhibiting assertiveness in contrast to caution he showed most of his first term.
lead_paragraph: As the president readies his State of the Union address, many associates say he is exhibiting an assertiveness in contrast to the caution he showed most of his first term.

headline.seo: Watching a Victorious Obama for Signs of Change
headline.main: Watching Obama for Signs of Change
headline.print_headline: Watching Obama For Signs Of Change
